(wait until tonight  and I'll told you the name)
:: Trasmental mole ::

The transmetal mole was traveling underground in order
to get the new pod for Darkfate.

He knew that his master will be glad to get it and in
spite of his blindess he could get the pod and
reprogramed it thanks at the bat-probe that located it
and was watching it.

Soon he would arrive where pod was, being trasmetal
had several good-points... in 45 minutes he would
reach  it.

Several tunnels existed underground and rocks weren't
a challenge to his sharped craws and his speed
undergroud was highest than all bots, by now nobody
could win him.

He was near... he could feel the pod's energy... he
started to open a hole that let him left the underground.
